translations: 1. 吸收，摄取：从外部环境中吸收液体、知识或信息。
· He imbibes a glass of wine every night.

sentences.sentence: He imbibes vast quantities of strong coffee.
An engine imbibes fuel (steam, fission, petrol, or elbow grease) and transforms it into work.
sentences.translation: 发动机吸收燃料(蒸汽、裂变、汽油或者做大量的功)并将其转换为功。

sentences.sentence: My car imbibes all the weapons and evil and turns them into a peace song for a better world.
sentences.translation: 我的车就吸收所有的武器和邪恶，并把它们变成一个和平的歌曲更美好的世界。
